Carma Laboratories manufactures lip care and skin care products. The Company offers lip balms, hydrating lotions, creams, ointments, and other related products.

Carmex is a widely recognized brand of lip balm known for its distinctive yellow-and-red packaging and its medicated formula. The product is designed to soothe and protect dry, chapped lips, offering relief from discomfort and promoting healing. Carmex lip balm is available in various forms, ...

t: Working at Carma Laboratories , Inc. | Great Place To Work®
s: Carma Laboratories is a family owned and operated business that produces Carmex lip balm. Our products range from medicated to natural and everything in between. As a small, family brand, we care deeply about our customers and are committed to helping you look and feel your very best.

It all began with a great idea and a strong work ethic. The success story of Carmex® fills us with great pride and serves as a role model for all of us. Learn more about our history!
